Articles.Content: Hi  ! Guys I'm here today, because i am developing a mod to KSP, it have a time in production, I had to stop due to Coronavirus disease, but now i am back; the point it is that the game updated to 1.10 and now jool is a gorgeus gas giant with animations, even before the update ( still in 1.7 ) i developed a new jool's texture, but now i want to animate it and put in the game, the animation part it's not a problem to me, I am a designer, what i want to know it is the format of the archive, how it have to be and how can i put it into the game. Can you help me ?
